Pre-Game Insights: Brazil have work to do if they are to make good on their target in 2026.
Brazil have the talent to pursue their objectives and have the potential to propel their country to success at the World Cup.
Brazil's new permanent coach Dorival Junior comes into the Copa America with just four matches, all friendlies, behind him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rose Bowl is a 'holy site' for Brazilian football, where they sealed their fourth World Cup title in 1994.
Brazil's current captain Danilo emphasized the importance of winning games over playing beautiful football.
Others: Brazil will not be returning to the Rose Bowl for the World Cup in 2026, as the stadium is not on the list of 11 U.S. venues.
Brazil's squad has undergone a generational shift, with old timers such as Casemiro, Thiago Silva, and Neymar absent from this squad.
